channel.title: Allstar
channel.description:
i own a allstar based server and i was wondering how i could add ::hpring
or a ring that can give infinite hp please somone reply

item.title: Allstar
item.dc:creator: @Mod-Vlad Mod-Vlad-
item.description:
@Mod-Vlad wrote:

I could make the code for client.java, but i’m too lazy to do it.
I will recomment you to follow these steps:
Download HomieScape source -> Open client.java -> press ctrl+f and insert “hpring” ( watch the code of item which is inside ) -> move the scroller against into the top -> ctrl+f “item id of a ring” -> Search there, the option is simple. I had no problems with making it. Having a problems? I might help with TeamViewer.

Read full topic
